S.FORM: Erick Barkley ( , NBA ) Erick Barkley ( , NBA ) Erick Barkley nalecuhan i Queens, New York, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Erick Barkley i 2000 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 28, namapili' tu nu Portland Trail Blazers putiput. 2 bulad 21 demiad, 1978 a mihca, Erick Barkley, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
